heroSection.bio: I provide end to end website development services, from initial design to final deployment. My focus is on delivering responsive, reliable, and professional web solutions.

aboutSection.bio: I’m Youssef Elsabawy, a web developer with over {yearsOfExperience} years of experience. I specialize in creating complete websites from scratch starting with modern, responsive designs, developing clean and functional code, and deploying fully optimized websites ready for users.

story: My name is Youssef Elsabawy, born and raised in Alexandria, Egypt.
I studied at Victory College School, where I graduated in 2017 with a strong academic foundation.
From the age of 6 until 16, I played basketball at Alexandria Sporting Club.
I pursued my higher education at Alexandria University, majoring in Computer Science. In 2021, I graduated as one of the top 10 students in my class.
After graduation, I served in the Egyptian Army, where I was assigned to Naval Security.
Following my military service, I started my professional journey in the technology field as a Full Stack Engineer.
aboutPage.reflection: My journey through sports, academics, military service, and professional work has shaped my character and values. I’ve learned discipline, perseverance, and adaptability, and I remain dedicated to growing, learning, and contributing positively in everything I do.
Technical: • SQL Database Internship at Alexandria Port
• Software Engineering Internship at RMZ Tech
• Full Stack Internship at ITI (1 month)
• Graduation Project: E-commerce platform with image search functionality
• Developed Roaden Mobile Application (project paused due to funding)
• Full Stack Internship at ITI (3 months)
• Solved 300+ algorithm and coding problems on LeetCode
• Full-time Full Stack Engineer at Techhive

serviceSection.title: Design, develop, and launch end to end
serviceSection.bio1: From the first line of code to a polished live product, I build websites that perform, scale, and inspire.
serviceSection.bio2: Whether starting from scratch or improving an existing project, I craft digital experiences that deliver at every stage.

services.title: UI/UX & Web Design
services.content: Creating clean, modern, and intuitive designs that focus on user experience and usability.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.content: Building responsive, interactive, and user friendly interfaces using React, Next.js, and modern frontend tools.

services.title: Backend Development
services.content: Developing robust server side applications with Node.js, Express, and database solutions like MongoDB and SQL.

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.content: Delivering complete end to end web applications by seamlessly integrating frontend and backend systems.

services.title: API Development & Integration
services.content: Creating secure RESTful APIs and integrating third party services to extend functionality and connectivity.

services.title: Deployment & DevOps
services.content: Deploying applications to cloud platforms, setting up CI/CD pipelines, and optimizing for speed, scalability, and performance.

details: Worked at Squarements as a Frontend Developer, focusing mainly on building scalable web applications using Angular
Developed features for the Laser application using Angular, improving user experience and interface performance.
Built core modules of the Motkalem platform using Angular, including dashboards and auth flows.
Contributed to project planning, feature analysis, and performance optimization.

projects.name: Ingenium
details: Built 90% of the frontend for Ingenium, including dynamic calendars, milestone tracking, invoicing systems, notifications, and messaging features.
Developed 100% of the dashboard to provide comprehensive user control and insights.
Integrated backend APIs for real-time data synchronization across the platform.

projects.name: App ASAP
details: Improved error monitoring for Terraform issues using AWS services.
Enhanced system reliability and streamlined troubleshooting.
Developed the auction system, including triggers and functions to validate winning bids.
Handled 50% of both frontend and backend development using C# and .NET in an agile team.
Worked with a team to normalize databases and improve data integrity.
Helped enhance database reliability and performance through normalization.

projects.name: Eontech
details: Built 100% of the frontend for the company website using modern frameworks.
Contributed 50% to backend development and deployment processes.
Collaborated with team members to ensure smooth integration between frontend and backend.
Optimized deployment pipeline for faster and more reliable releases.

projects.name: Auction System
details: Developed a robust auction system to enable real-time bidding engagement.
Automated daily triggers to process and update completed auction statuses.
Built using C# .NET and SQL for the backend, and Angular for the frontend.

projects.name: Paintiro
details: Built with React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB (full front-end and back-end).
Developed a complete e-commerce system for selling paintings.
Created an admin dashboard to manage orders, paintings, and promo codes.
Implemented an integrated email messaging system for customer communication.
Integrated Backblaze B2 for cloud storage and data management.

projects.name: Roaden
details: Contributed as part of a development team to build a car-booking app (similar to Uber) with unique features.
Implemented efficient backend functionality using MongoDB, ensuring scalability and reliability.
Developed the mobile application with Flutter and Dart, delivering a smooth and user-friendly experience.
Utilized AWS for cloud storage and infrastructure support.
Integrated image processing to optimize and reduce uploaded document size.

projects.name: Graduation Project
details: Built a full-featured e-commerce website supporting complete CRUD operations across product categories.
Developed an admin dashboard for managing products, users, and orders.
Integrated an AI-based model enabling users to search for products by uploading an image, returning exact or similar product matches.

project.title: Eontech.dev
project.Description: A professional software company website based in the USA. I built 100% of the frontend and handled 50% of the backend and deployment, ensuring a responsive, scalable, and reliable platform.

project.title: Paintiro
project.Description: A full-stack E-commerce platform for selling paintings. I built 100% of the frontend and backend, including a powerful admin dashboard for managing artworks, users, and orders.

project.title: Ingenium pros
project.Description: A freelancing and outsourcing platform similar to Upwork, designed to connect businesses with top talent across various industries. I developed 90% of the frontend, including interactive dashboards, milestone tracking, invoicing, notifications, and real-time messaging. I also integrated backend APIs to ensure smooth and reliable data synchronization, enhancing the overall user experience.

project.title: Joumana Co
project.Description: Joumana Co. has been a trusted name in sheep casing craftsmanship for over 75 years, proudly serving global clients with quality and tradition. I personally handled 100% of the website design and development, ensuring a modern and professional online presence.

project.title: Qshare
project.Description: Create quizzes easily, assign them to an email or make them public. Generate a unique link so anyone can answer. Also no account required.

project.title: Sentiomail
project.Description: Email Messaging System, Send emails quickly and securely from My website with easy to use controls.

project.title: Typing-speed
project.Description: Typing Speed per Minute (WPM) refers to how many words a person can type correctly within one minute
